modal.header.title: Request review
modal.placeholder.comments: Add any notes for the reviewer...
bulk.modal.title: Bulk Request Review
bulk.modal.warning.title: You are about to request {count, plural, one {a review} other {reviews}} for {count, plural, one {# document} other {# documents}}
bulk.modal.warning.description: This will assign the same reviewer and comments to all selected documents. Any existing pending reviews for these documents will remain unchanged.
bulk.modal.checkbox.confirm: I confirm that I want to request {count, plural, one {a review} other {reviews}} for {count, plural, one {} other {all}} {count} selected {count, plural, one {document} other {documents}}
bulk.modal.button.send: Send {count, plural, one {# Review} other {# Reviews}}
bulk.notification.success: Review requests sent successfully for {successCount, plural, one {# document}, other {# documents}}
bulk.notification.partial: Review requests sent successfully for {successCount, plural, one {# document}, other {# documents}}. {errorCount} failed.
bulk.notification.error: Failed to send review requests for all {errorCount} documents
taskCenter.header.title: Review Task Center
taskCenter.header.subtitle: Manage your review tasks and track reviews you've assigned
taskCenter.assignedToMe.title: Reviews Waiting for Your Approval
taskCenter.assignedToMe.description: These documents have been assigned to you for review. Click on a row to view the document.
taskCenter.assignedToMe.empty: No pending reviews assigned to you
taskCenter.assignedByMe.title: Reviews You've Requested
taskCenter.assignedByMe.description: Track the status of reviews you've assigned to others. Click on a row to view the document.
taskCenter.assignedByMe.empty: No pending or rejected reviews assigned by you
taskCenter.assignedByMe.pendingDescripti: Reviews you've requested that are waiting for the reviewer's decision.
taskCenter.assignedByMe.pendingEmpty: No pending reviews assigned by you
taskCenter.assignedByMe.rejectedDescript: These reviews were rejected by the reviewer. Update the content and re-request the review.
taskCenter.assignedByMe.rejectedEmpty: No rejected reviews requiring your action
taskCenter.table.title: Title
taskCenter.rejected.title: Rejected Reviews
taskCenter.rejected.description: Reviews you rejected. The requester may re-submit with changes.
rejectModal.title: Reject Review
rejectModal.description: Please provide a reason for rejecting this review. This will help the requester understand what changes are needed.
rejectModal.placeholder.reason: Please explain why you are rejecting this review...
reRequestModal.title: Re-request Review
reRequestModal.description: Add a comment explaining what changes you have made or why you are re-requesting the review.
reRequestModal.placeholder.comment: Describe the changes you have made...
commentHistory.title: Comment History
bulk.validation.confirmRequired: Please confirm that you want to request reviews for multiple documents
